# rideIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier that you assigned to the ride.

## Declaration

```swift
var rideIdentifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

SiriKit sets this property to the ride identifier you provided in your [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INRideStatus] object when booking the ride or supplying its status.
title: rideIdentifier
